name: sass-architecture-structure
description: ``` scss/ |- abstracts/ |   |– _function.scss    # Sass Functions |   |– _mixin.scss       # Sass Mixins |   |- _variables        # Sass Variables | |– base/ |   |– _reset.scss       # Reset/normalize |   |– _helper.scss      # Class & placeholders helpers |   ...                  # Etc… | |– components/ |   |– _buttons.scss     # Buttons |   |– _tab.scss         # Tab |   |– _tooltip.scss     # Tooltip |   ...                  # Etc… | |– layout/ |   |– _navigation.scss  # Navigation |   |– _header.scss      # Header |   |– _footer.scss      # Footer |   ...                  # Etc… | |– pages/ |   |– _home.scss        # Home specific styles |   |– _contact.scss     # Contact specific styles |   ...                  # Etc… | `– style.scss            # Primary Sass file ```
